nodes.bodyText: I can't find anything similar to String.isNotEmpty(), hamcrest supports something like this assertThat(string, is(not(emptyString()))) but that does not seem any better to me

You must call it on the object returned by assertThat not String.
E.g.: assertThat("test").isNotEmpty();
